des:
Make your home smarter with Laser SmartHome! Once you enable the Laser SmartHome skill for Amazon Alexa, users can simply ask the Echo Dot to turn on/off, dim/brighten, change colour of their lights or schedule plugs to turn on at different times. The Echo Dot and Laser SmartHome products work together to create a seamless smart home experience that is simple and easy.

Connect your Laser SmartHome products in a few simple steps.

1) Download the "Laser SmartHome" App on the Google Play Store or iOS App Store
2) Log-in or register a new account for Laser SmartHome
3) You will need to pair your smart Devices with Laser SmartHome
4) Download the Amazon Alexa App from Google Play, iOS App store or Amazon App Market
5) Configure your Echo Dot with the Amazon Alexa App
6) Search for "Laser SmartHome skill for Amazon Alexa" under Skills and Games
7) Once you enable the Skill, you will be directed to log-in to Laser SmartHome. Please use the same account from step 2
8) Setup is now complete

You can enjoy voice control on your Smart Devices such as:
“Alexa, turn on the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, turn off the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, set the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa, brighten the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa, dim the bedroom light to 50%.”
"Alexa, set bedroom light to green."
"Alexa, set bedroom light to cool white."
